website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and user-friendly alternative to the AT Pro. Plenty of search modes and depth options.
pros: Very easy to assemble straight out of the box
Can pinpoint a valuable target surrounded by junk
Designed with beginners and casual hobbyists in mind
cons: Headphones may or may not be included in original package
Almost too sensitive at times, picks up many junk signals

customer_reviews.title: One Working Detector
customer_reviews.text: After looking for a nice metal detector for my son, I decided to purchase this one for a Christmas Present. After today I'm glad I did. 15 minutes into it, he a good target. Very pleased with the purchase and the seller. Shipping was good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: I had the ace 350 for a few years and this came out. So I sold the 350 and bought the 400 I'm glad I did the 350 is an awesome machine but the 400 is better with the tones, iron audio and I love the number scale. I have found all the nickels I have missed in my yard. After I master this I'm going to buy the At Gold. Great service from the seller as well
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent detector!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've probably spent 8 hours or so detecting with this in and around my neighborhood. So far the best of the best stuff I've found is a 1940 Walking Liberty silver half dollar and a 1932 14k gold class ring. Not too bad at all. Hands down, this is definitely a good detector!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Barney

customer_reviews.title: it was so easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. It came with an instruction manual and, after watching the video package on the Garrett site, it was so easy to work with. My husband loves it, it works so much better than the older (other brand) we purchased some 25 years ago.... Would recommend this package to all.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ogle

customer_reviews.title: Great detector with many of the features of the AT ...
customer_reviews.text: Great detector with many of the features of the AT PRO at a lower price point. This is also a major upgrade over the ACE 150 and 250. It handles interference much, much better and the DD coil separates signals way better. If you're a beginner, intermediate, or even seasoned metal detectorist this is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jcoa

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I am kind of disappointed with the accuracy of the ace 400. For $350 get a bounty hunter IV.. you may not get the screen but the screen useless on the ace 400... I went out yesterday and all my targets would go to 80-90 then randomly drop down to a iron range.. then wait a minute then check it again 80-90.. then go back down to a iron range.. dug it up and it was 10 cents.. and just to confirm did a wiggle over it and it would do the same thing.. $100 gets you just as good of a detector. I am going to keep it though as I already gave away my bounty hunter.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: great detector great delivery
customer_reviews.text: This metal detector is better than the average entry level detector for dry land. Water not so good so far, but that is clearly disclosed if you research the product. It is basically an AT Pro without the proportional sound feature (Pro mode) and is not waterproof. This was a gift to my son. It seems to pick up targets as deep as my AT Pro under all conditions except in salt water. I suggest you limit your looking with this machine at the beach to dry sand.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Coil is large enough to cover a lot of area but might work against you when a finer discrimination is required
customer_reviews.text: First time detector (ist) and there was definately a learning curve. I've found a lot of stuff, nothing valuable yet, and use it regularly. Coil is large enough to cover a lot of area but might work against you when a finer discrimination is required. Really wish it had a ground balance and volume control but otherwise I am quite happy with the performance of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Woolman

customer_reviews.title: After much  research this is the one to get!
customer_reviews.text: We had an issue with the first one it would not fit together at all ..... excellent customer service... got a new one that is awesome. This metal detector is awesome I am not 100% healthy and it is so light weight I was able to use it for 2 1/2 hours the first time out with it ! Found $1.25 ...I’m living on the edge lol will pay for it soon with my finds!:). Watch some of the how to videos and immediately you will start finding things! Great product Garrett! I only wish Garrett would sell carbon fiber sand scoop pole to go with their wonderful quality sand scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Z.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Metal Detector
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product delivered in a timely manner. I’ve had an older Bounty Hunter for years. And it did (does) a darn good job. But since I’ve gotten this new Garret Ace 400, I’ve been going over the same spots I went over with the older detector. And keep finding new stuff!!! A high quality unit at a reasonable price. You can’t go wrong by purchasing this detector. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my new hobby
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this detector, I have never used one before but the Garrett makes the learning easy
customer_reviews.author: S. House

customer_reviews.title: Product should last more than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: did not even last thru the life of the original batteries. Would return if I could. I would not recommend. Constant noise on every surface.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Machine For Beginners
customer_reviews.text: While I don't have that many hours on this machine, I am impressed with it. I do wish it had a volume control on the machine instead of the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Dan from Jackson

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 4 different detectors of different brands. I love Garrett's. I bought this one to replace two that were stolen from my vehicle. I went from a Ace 300 to a 400. I is so easy to use, I had my 13 year old granddaughter finding "treasure" her first time. Going to have to get a second Metal Detector so I will have one to use. Grand kids love sharing my hobby, I love spending time with the grand kids.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic detector.  Don’t start with low grade units. Start here.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I had purchased a different unit to start a new hobby. I quickly returned it and purchased this device. It’s amazing. Does a great job discriminating objects and localizing treasures. The pin point function is perfect for setting your dig site. The discrimination functions work superb for excluding trash from treasure. If I find 3000 more dimes, it pays for itself. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: L. Plummer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner at this, didn't want a cheap toy, and didn't want to spend a grand either. So far.. 2 uses.. dug up a bunch of aluminum foil.. 43 cents.. and some various junk. Gonna take some time to pay for itself I think. But sure is fun
customer_reviews.author: Bubbarosa

customer_reviews.title: Take your time and learn what it can do.
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid the detector would miss a lot of objects, but the opposite is true. It finds everything and you have to sift through the signal to decide if it's worth digging or not.
customer_reviews.author: everybodyL1ES

customer_reviews.title: Detects good
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this is the right one for beginners because I think it's a little more advanced. I've used it several times since I received it and have no complaints. I have found the it finds even the small stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Cashrainbow

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Now I’m hooked. Only wish I would have bought top model now. Easy to use you cannot go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mike frost

customer_reviews.title: Almost paid for itself the first week.
customer_reviews.text: The overall build quality is decent, I’ve used the detector about a dozen times, and I’m getting use to it. On day 3 I found a $340.00 silver charm bracelet on the beach with it, so I’m pretty happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Walter McMillan

customer_reviews.title: How amazing it works
customer_reviews.text: It came two days ahead of schedule which is amazing ,I have not been able to use it much , but the little I have it's a great machine picking up so much more than the old one have which is another brand
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Still new at figuring out how it works but looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with it. I'm new at detecting but it's been fun so far. Good quality, easy to use & pretty light.
customer_reviews.author: JMor

customer_reviews.title: ... metal detector arrived in a timely manner and works great. Still getting used to the operation but I ...
customer_reviews.text: The metal detector arrived in a timely manner and works great. Still getting used to the operation but I love it. The iron function is a big help but it is hard to tell the difference between bottle caps and coins but I am getting better.
customer_reviews.author: catfish

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dad has an old Garrett Groundhog model (from the late 70s to early 80s I think), and it works perfectly. Because of that, I decided to spend some of my tax return money on this highly-rated metal detector. Incredibly impressed! It is very user friendly, where an amateur (like me) does not have to be particularly skilled to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Easy controls, easy to read display and loads of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Ive always wanted one, never had one, and found out there is SO MUCH out there to go find. I used it, my son has used it, my grand daughter loves it, so I can totally see getting more than my moneys worth in fun.
customer_reviews.author: Zipparado

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cash
customer_reviews.text: I'm having lots of fun with this. This is very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for Christmas. He loves it! It works great, it takes some time and practice to understand it and get the settings where you want. It definitely works great. But We haven’t found anything that’s gonna make us rich yet. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garrett rocks !
customer_reviews.text: By far the best low-mid range detector out there, alot of fun and easily pays for itself if you put in the effort. I use this more than my more expensive and advanced detectors because I keep it in my truck all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse James

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit as a Christmas present to my 35 year old son. He and the kids had great fun finding all kinds of things in the yard including matchbook cars that belonged to him when he was little. Seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia E. Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works as good as the more expensive models. Garrett is great company
customer_reviews.author: trikeman

customer_reviews.title: overall a nice
customer_reviews.text: the main head is lower in the front than the back ,,so if you position the head one inch to the ground the back is a bout three inches,,it needs a bolt that let the head set even on the ground..thank you,,overall a nice detectpr
customer_reviews.author: jim rogers

customer_reviews.title: No longer have it
customer_reviews.text: I owned this for 1 week, returned it for a refund cause I didn't need it after all.
customer_reviews.author: Art Harrington

customer_reviews.title: ACE 400!!! What a machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! So much detector for so little money. Sold my Whites VX3 last year and thought I'd scale down a bit with this ACE400 at a third of the price. I am so thoroughly surprised of its performance that it is as pleasurable using as my older more expensive detector. I highly recommend you buying this.....should cost more based on its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Romano

customer_reviews.title: So easy and effective first day out i found a pre ...
customer_reviews.text: So easy and effective first day out i found a pre civil war milita belt plate WOW All features you need without the huge price of other models
customer_reviews.author: SamCorgi

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely feel like I got my moneys worth in this purchase. I have enjoyed learning how to use the Ace 400. My 6 year old is not bad with it either. I never fail to find coins everytime I go out; even if just for 15 mins at a time. The iron audio and pinpointing are a plus. I have solid finds even in heavy granite and iron soil. I use the higher pitch tones and numeric display to chose what to dig for. I can pretty much call what I will unearth prior to my digging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beginners luck
customer_reviews.text: Great detector. A little heavy for me but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: CHANDRA L Parra

customer_reviews.title: it looks like it was advetised, have not used yet
customer_reviews.text: have to read the book on the different sounds, so you know what it is detecting
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect detector, just haven't found a lost treasure yet. Fun, fun, fun
customer_reviews.author: ownever

customer_reviews.title: Fairly. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Has not been used yet, but the recipient was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ey.

customer_reviews.title: Garrett ace 400!
customer_reviews.text: Great detector, the headphones come broke already, snapped in half. But I wasnt planning on using them anyways, work great on everything I put in front of it from gold to silver to a cab tab
customer_reviews.author: Big guy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy!
customer_reviews.text: It came 4 days ahead of the shipping guess, product was as described!
customer_reviews.author: Eddy O

customer_reviews.title: Us postal service sucks!
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect I enjoy that it has a coil cover because I live in rugged terrain! The only problem I had was with the us postal service that delivered my 350$ metal detector to the wrong house!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this detector, great qaulity for the money, very accurate and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: They love it
customer_reviews.text: Never used it; a year later gifted it to a club ... where this Garrett's reputation is golden!

customer_reviews.title: Great metal detector
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my Garrett metal detector takes a little work to get use to but great fun

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, made in the USA!  Excellent Sellers!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner and it is lots of fun and is pretty easy to understand once you practice.

customer_reviews.text: It was the cat's meow where a moderately priced metal detector is concerned.

customer_reviews.title: Garrett Detectors, best of the best.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, easy to use, customer friendly, and one of the top detectors on the market.

customer_reviews.title: It is a coin magnet - I love the turn on and go.
customer_reviews.text: It is a coin magnet - I love the turn on and go.

customer_reviews.text: It's good for the price ! Once you go out n used it ! You'll get familiar with the numbers n tones !

customer_reviews.text: It is a very good product, and amazing customer support

customer_reviews.title: Over priced, poor quality

customer_reviews.title: Had a hard time figuring it out
customer_reviews.text: Used for fun. Complicated to learn how to use, for me anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great detector for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great detector, easy to use and new features are are nice. I used to have an ace 250. The digital ID and are great additions. The detector is very sensitive to small items. It's a fun detector!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Purchase regret
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thought it was, so disappointed. I’m thinking of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The Ace 400 metal detector works great. It has several functions on it that my previous detector didn't have. I would have given it a 5 star rating, but the package was missing the headphones that were supposed to come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoomie

customer_reviews.title: Garrett did great!
customer_reviews.text: Garrett has done a great job with this detector, adding iron audio to the ace series and utilizing pwm audio, the response time between objectives is clearly heard. You can tell if it's one target or two. I have found pendants, coins, a diamond earring, horse and oxen shoes and my first crotal bell!! This detector does it all and at a reasonable price! I highly recommend the Garrett Ace 400 for the weekend warrior or hardcore hobbyist!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and worked perfectly searching for treasure. Definitely distinguishes the different metals if used properly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: It is everything they say it is and works great. Once you get used your machine
customer_reviews.text: This is my first metal detector and I have used it a few times before the winter set in. It is everything they say it is and works great. Once you get used your machine, which does not take long ( a few hours), you can find great stuff and pass over most of the junk. Recommend this to first time metal detectors.

customer_reviews.title: I really like it,
customer_reviews.text: I really like it ,,, going to take more practice to pin point items ,, but glad I got it

customer_reviews.title: I'm addicted and this puppy works great kind of like the non waterproof AT Pro
customer_reviews.text: First I was like why would I spend this much money on a metal detector and then I was like this thing's awesome now Ive bought so much metal detecting stuff LOL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great. found bunch of things already and only used it twice.

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the metal detecting Hobby so I figured I would purchase a mid-priced detector that would meet my needs. I took it out yesterday and had lots of fun with it was able to discriminate many different types of metals and I found different coins I also took it under the water and it performed well there also the only problem was I found a lot of trash underwater but that is not the detectors fault hopefully one day I will find jewelry since I am just starting out. machine seems to be very well made accurate and dependable so far

customer_reviews.title: Is this something you need? Probably not. However this is a very fun tool, you should reward yourself and purchase it.
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a metal detector. After reading all of the reviews on Amazon I chose this Garrett. This is an awesome tool. I haven’t found anything of any value yet, but I’m sure if I look long enough I will find it.

customer_reviews.text: Amazing what you can get, today as opposed to our older machines. This one beats our GTA 1000 which cost $600 in 1995

customer_reviews.text: Nice, did not come with the headphones? ??? Detector 5 star. Wish I would gave bought with the 8" coil. From whatI have seen it us much more sensitive. Very happy with the detector. You need the headphones so you don't disturn others.
customer_reviews.author: Bonemachine

customer_reviews.title: Hidden treasures
customer_reviews.text: Hidden treasures are out there but this detector makes finding them a lot more fun and easier. The pinpointer is super.

The only drawback to having two of them is we can't be real close to each other as they seem to interfere with each other but other than that it's an amazing unit and I highly recommend it. We have found many coins with ours.

customer_reviews.text: I received my ACE 400 4 days ago and I've been out hunting 3 times already. In this amount of time I've already started to get a real feel for the settings you can use while treasure hunting. I have already located several coins and a nice piece of jewelry. Beyond satisfied with this machine, can't wait to upgrade my kids to some ACE models!

customer_reviews.author: Frager's Just Ask

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time...
customer_reviews.text: Alerts on everything. I bought this to try to trace some metal pipes running shallowly across my property. But it took just 30 minutes to realize that using a metal detector was useless for this purpose. Too many other targets? I would run the detector right over the exposed pipe and it was just one beep among a cacophony of other beeps.... Beware!
customer_reviews.author: RedlandsReader

product_meta.title: Garrett Ace 400 Metal Detector with Waterproof Coil and Headphone Plus Accessories
product_meta.description:
Size:ACE 400The ACE 400 includes a higher, 10 kHz frequency to provide better sensitivity to low and medium conductivity targets, such as gold and lead. 

The detector’s Frequency Adjust feature allows users to easily toggle between slight frequency shifts to help eliminate interference from other detectors or power sources. 

The ACE 400 ships with an 8.5×11 DD-configuration PROformance searchcoil that has proven to be very popular with the company’s previous ACE 350 and EuroACE detectors. 

The ACE 400 includes five discrimination modes, electronic pinpointing, sensitivity adjustment, and High-Resolution Iron Discrimination. 

The ACE 400 will ship with three FREE accessories to complement the new release: an 8.5”x11” DD searchcoil cover; volume-control ClearSound Easy Stow headphones; and a new ACE Environmental Cover-up to protect the control box from rain, dust, and mud.
feature_bullets: Extra Accessories: Garrett 8.5" x 11" Search Coil Cover, ClearSound Headphones, Garrett ACE Rain Cover

Also Includes: Garrett 8.5" x 11" PROformance DD Waterproof Search Coil, Adjustable Arm Strap, Garrett ACE 400 Instruction Manual, Garrett Search Coil Hardware Kit, 4 "AA" Batteries Included, FREE Garrett Catalog, FREE Garrett Searcher Magazine, Exclusive 2 Year Warranty
Includes Electronic Pinpointing: precisely locates targets and speeds recovery Notch Discrimination: Modify discrimination patterns based on what you are seeking.
New Adjustable Frequency, New More Stable Camlocks, Enhanced Iron Resolution
2 year Warranty, 5 Search Modes, New Higher Frequency 10 kHz, Digital Target ID

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars304 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
